planet.description: The planetary system around HD 219134 was discovered independently by teams using HARPS-N and APF, who announced four-planet and six-planet solutions respectively. Spitzer observations allowed the discoverers to detect the transit of the innermost planet in front of the star making HD 219134 b the nearest known transiting planet to date.
